panels.description: The number of hosts currently configured to be monitored.
panels.title: Hosts

panels.description:
The percentage of monitored hosts.

A monitored host is a host with at least one responding connector.
panels.title: Coverage

panels.description:
Total current power usage across all sites, multiplied by the site's PUE.

This number represents the actual power usage of all sites. It takes into account the cooling and other overhead that supports the equipment.
panels.title: Total Power * PUE

panels.description:
Total current power usage across all sites, multiplied by the site's PUE, displayed as a graph.

This number represents the actual power usage of all sites. It takes into account the cooling and other overhead that supports the equipment.
panels.title: Total Power * PUE

panels.description: Today's total power consumption for all sites.
panels.title: Today's Live Consumption

panels.description:
The overall power consumption reported for all sites in the last 24 hours.

If less than 24 hours of data is available, this value is estimated based on the past collected data.
panels.title: Daily Consumption

panels.description:
The overall energy cost of all sites for the last 24 hours.

If less than 24 hours of data is available, this value is estimated based on past collected data.

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time(sum by (site) (hw_host_power_watts)[1d:5m]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_pue_ratio)[1d:5m]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_electricity_cost)[1d:5m])) * 24 / 1000

panels.title: Daily Cost

panels.description:
The overall volume of CO₂ emitted by all the sites for the last 24 hours.

If less than 24 hours of data is available, this value is estimated based on the past collected data.

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time(sum by (site) (hw_host_power_watts)[1d:5m]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_pue_ratio)[1d:5m]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_carbon_intensity_grams)[1d:5m])) * 24 / 1000 / 1000 / 1000

panels.title: Daily CO₂ Emissions

panels.description: Total current power usage of all hosts across all sites.
panels.title: Total Power

panels.description: Today's total power cost for all sites.

targets.expr: sum(sum by (site) (increase(hw_host_energy_joules_total[$__range])) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_pue_ratio)[$__range:5m]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_electricity_cost)[$__range:5m])) / 3600 / 1000

panels.title: Today's Live Cost

panels.description:
The overall power consumption reported for all sites during the last 30 days.

If less than 30 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on past collected data.
panels.title: Monthly Consumption

panels.description:
The overall energy cost of all sites for the last 30 days.

If less than 30 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on past collected data.

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time(sum by (site) (hw_host_power_watts)[30d:1h]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_pue_ratio)[30d:1h]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_electricity_cost)[30d:1h])) * 30.437 * 24 / 1000

panels.title: Monthly Cost

panels.description:
The overall volume of CO₂ emitted by all the sites for the last 30 days.

If less than 30 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on the past collected data.

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time(sum by (site) (hw_host_power_watts)[30d:1h]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_pue_ratio)[30d:1h]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_carbon_intensity_grams)[30d:1h])) * 30.467 * 24 / 1000 / 1000 / 1000

panels.title: Monthly CO₂ Emissions

panels.description:
The power consumption's margin of error.

This value is based on the number of hosts that report measured power consumptions and the number of hosts whose power consumption is estimated.

When the power consumed by a host cannot be read, Hardware Sentry estimates this value based on the host's components (CPUs, disks, network interfaces, etc.) and their usage.
panels.title: Margin of Error

panels.description: Today's volume of CO₂ emissions for all sites.

targets.expr: sum(sum by (site) (increase(hw_host_energy_joules_total[$__range])) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_pue_ratio)[$__range:5m]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_carbon_intensity_grams)[$__range:5m])) / 3600 / 1000 / 1000 / 1000

panels.title: Today's Live CO₂ Emissions

panels.description:
The overall power consumption reported for all sites during the last year.

If less than 365 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on past collected data.
panels.title: Yearly Consumption

panels.description:
The overall energy cost of all sites for the past year.

If less than 365 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on past collected data.

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time(sum by (site) (hw_host_power_watts)[1y:1d]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_pue_ratio)[1y:1d]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_electricity_cost)[1y:1d])) * 365 * 24 / 1000

panels.title: Yearly Cost

panels.description:
The overall volume of CO₂ emitted by all the sites for the past year.

If less than 365 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on the past collected data.

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time(sum by (site) (hw_host_power_watts)[1y:1d]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_pue_ratio)[1y:1d]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_carbon_intensity_grams)[1y:1d])) * 365 * 24 / 1000 / 1000 / 1000

panels.title: Yearly CO₂ Emissions

panels.description:
The sites' yearly power consumption.

These values are estimated according to the past data if less than a year of data has been collected.
panels.title: Yearly Consumption

panels.description:
The sites' yearly cost.

These values are estimated according to the past data if less than a year of data has been collected.

targets.expr: avg_over_time(sum by (site) (hw_host_power_watts)[1y:1d]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_pue_ratio)[1y:1d]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_electricity_cost)[1y:1d]) * 365 * 24 / 1000

panels.title: Yearly Cost

panels.description:
The sites' yearly CO₂ emissions. 

These values are estimated according to the past data if less than a year of data has been collected.

targets.expr: avg_over_time(sum by (site) (hw_host_power_watts)[1y:1d]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_pue_ratio)[1y:1d]) * avg_over_time(avg by (site) (hw_site_carbon_intensity_grams)[1y:1d]) * 365 * 24 / 1000 / 1000 / 1000

panels.title: Yearly CO₂

The temperature sensors reporting the highest temperatures at the moment.

panels.description: The overall daily energy consumption for the past 30 days, as reported.
